name: News Media Expert
description: Specialized in translating news media content, ensuring accurate and idiomatic translations for news articles, reports, and media-related content.
author: immersive

zh-CN.name: 新闻媒体
zh-CN.description: 专门翻译新闻媒体相关内容，确保新闻文章、报道和媒体相关内容的准确性和地道性。

zh-TW.name: 新聞媒體
